Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2018 08:15AM Earlyanna wrote: Hello! Starting radiation on Tuesday April 17th, 20 sessions. I have calendula soap and cream, Aquaphor (large bottle and travel size, as I have a bit of a daily commute to the hospital) and clear Aloe Vera Gel. In many ways, this has been a whirlwind ad. In many ways this has been a whirlwind adventure with a whole lot of hurry up and wait thrown in. So looking forward to getting started and moving ahead
